sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import HeartRating from "./HeartRating.js" import './Diary.css'; export default function Diary( { diaries, onDelete} ) { return (

{diaries.title}

{diaries.date ? `${diaries.date.getDate()}/${diaries.date.getMonth()}/${diaries.date.getFullYear()}` : null}

Treat your body well?

{diaries.bodyChecked}

{diaries.content}

) }
